name: nanote
tagline: A minimal markdown note taking app for self-hosting
description: Nanote is a minimal note-taking app with markdown support, tags, and search built for self-hosting. Itâ€™s designed to be lightweight, fast, and ideal for personal organization.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write and format notes using standard Markdown syntax with live preview

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize notes with tags for quick filtering and discovery

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find notes instantly by searching content, titles, or tags

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource footprint ideal for low-power servers or personal hosting

features.title: Mobile Responsive

features.title: Clean Interface
